name: Brox_Anthar
content:
Brox Anthar was a light-skinned Snivvian male criminal who lived during the time of the Galactic Empire. Between 8 BBY and 2 BBY, he was wanted for multiple accounts of grand larceny with the SoroSuub Corporation. As a result, SoroSuub reached out to the Benelex Marshal Service, which sent Marshal Buck Vancto to apprehend the Snivvian fugitive. The marshal tracked Anthar to the planet Hosnian Prime.
After Vancto gained information on his target from a Pa'lowick bartender, the marshal caught Anthar running down a street, making pursuit from atop the nearby buildings. Anthar's pursuer caught him with an electrified bola, bringing the Snivvian to the ground. As Vancto then jumped down and informed Anthar of his charges, the marshal was contacted by a Twi'lek who informed Vancto they had another job for him. Anthar wore a yellow and black top with brown trousers and a black belt, gloves, and boots.
Brox Anthar first appeared in the first issue of the Star Wars: Han Solo & Chewbacca comic series, written by Marc Guggenheim, illustrated by David Messina, and published by Marvel Comics on March 9, 2022.
